issue.subject: Copy an order does not check that product, properties, third-party or perimeter are still available
issue.description:
h2. Problems when an order is copied:

* A diffusion/product can:
** have been remove from diffusion
** changed diffusion access scope
** property change:
*** new mandatory property
*** mandatory property value not selected
*** removed property
* The resource can:
** have been removed from catalog
*** put in progress
*** archived
*** unpublished
** changed access scope
* Third party may not be selectable anymore
* Perimeter can not be usable for product list anymore 

h2. Behavior proposal :

* If a perimeter is not more available (perimeter removed, or disabled), but there is still a common perimeter: *allow copy* but *drop the perimeter* and *show a message* [2]
* If there is no more common perimeter : *block copy* [1]
* If there was a third party that is no more available : *allow copy* , *remove all third party information* and *add a message* [3] (this third party is no more available)

* *Anything that prevent a product to be added to the basket must block the copy* with a message [1], for example:
** A *new mandatory property* has been added
** A *mandatory property value* is not available anymore
** *Access scope* has been restricted on *diffusion* OR on *metadata* (user has no more access to it)
** Metadata has been *unpublished* or *archived*
** Diffusion has been *unpublished*
** Extraction has been *disabled*

* *Copy must be clean*, for example:
** If a property has been removed from diffusion, do not copy it in the new basket

[1] When copy is blocked, show a message an stay in the same screen : https://forge.easysdi.org/attachments/download/1009/block_copy.png
[2] Inform user that perimeter has been removed : https://forge.easysdi.org/attachments/download/1010/drop_perim.png
[3] Inform user that third party has been removed : https://forge.easysdi.org/attachments/download/1011/drop_tp.png
